name: BLOQOUT
description:
Thank you for choosing to download Bloqout! Bloqout is an addictive yet simple, fun, infinite matching block puzzle game where you match blocks by creating Rows, Columns, Diagonals, Squares, and Corners of the same color blocks to get points. Try to get the highest score you can with Special Bloqs, multipliers, multi plays, and more! This matching puzzle game will keep you and your friends entertained for years!

Featuring

-Leaderboards

-Skin Packs

-Great sound effects

-Great graphics

If you enjoy Bloqout please be sure to let us know. Like us on Facebook and Twitter at Divided By Zero Laboratories. Don't like Bloqout? No problem, just let us know what we can do to make better games for you. Customers can email us at dividedbyzerolaboratories@gmail.com Thank you again for your purchase!
